present.from sentence: In this paper , we present Bayesian subspace multinomial model ( Bayesian SMM ) as a generative model for bag - ofwords representation of documents .

learn to represent.from sentence: We show that our model can learn to represent each document in the form of a Gaussian distribution , thereby encoding the uncertainty in its covariance .

propose.from sentence: Further , we propose a generative Gaussian classifier that exploits this uncertainty for topic identification ( ID ) .

subspace n-gram model.can model: n-gram distribution of words in sentences

extended.from sentence: The proposed VB framework can be extended in a straightforward way for subspace n-gram model , that can model n-gram distribution of words in sentences .
